name: Drink 455
description: A specially-blended drink that's all the rage right now. Besides its smooth and refreshing taste, it's known for replenishing lost energy from long bouts of physical exertion. Why not try a bottle when you're feeling parched?

suspicious.name: Suspicious Drink 455
suspicious.description: A specially-blended drink that's all the rage right now. Except... you're not sure if there's something wrong with the formula, or you didn't mix the ingredients enough. The sour bits are too sour, the sweet bits are too sweet â€” and the fact that you can tell apart the "bits" in a liquid beverage is probably cause for concern...
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Drink 455
normal.description: A specially-blended drink that's all the rage right now. Besides its smooth and refreshing taste, it's known for replenishing lost energy from long bouts of physical exertion. Why not try a bottle when you're feeling parched?
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Drink 455
delicious.description: A specially-blended drink that's all the rage right now. Refreshing beyond belief, this invigorating beverage washes over you like sweet rain after a long drought, instantly melting away all fatigue and restlessness. "It's as if everything's finally right with the world!" was one customer's glowing review after finishing their glass.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.
